POSTLOGIN.TITLE: Next, set up a MoneyOwl investment account!
POSTLOGIN.AUTOFILL_QUICKLY:
Applicable to Singapore Citizens and Singapore Permanent Citizens (PRs) only.
Autofill your information quickly. Supporting documents are not required.
POSTLOGIN.FILL_MANUALLY: Applicable to foreigners and all. Fill in your information manually. Supporting documents are required. Takes at least 1 working day to get your account approved.
POSTLOGIN.START_INVESTING: Next, set up your investment account to start investing!

PERSONAL_INFO.TITLE: Personal Information
PERSONAL_INFO.DESCRIPTION: Please choose the profile that best describes you.

ERROR.POSTAL_CODE_DESC: Online Retrieval is not successful due to network issue or host down.

EMPLOYMENT_DETAILS.TITLE: Employment Details
EMPLOYMENT_DETAILS.OTHER_INDUSTRY: Please enter your industry in the input box provided.
EMPLOYMENT_DETAILS.OTHER_OCCUPATION: Please enter your occupation in the input box provided.

ERROR.POSTAL_CODE_DESC: Online Retrieval is not successful due to network issue or host down.

SELECT_NATIONALITY.QUESTION_ONE: Are you a United States Permanent Resident / Tax Resident?
SELECT_NATIONALITY.QUESTION_TWO: Are you a Singaporean Permanent Resident?
SELECT_NATIONALITY.SELECT_NATIONALITY_LAB2: To continue, please tell us what is your nationality
SELECT_NATIONALITY.IMPORTANT_NOTICE: Important: Please note that we do not accept applications if you
SELECT_NATIONALITY.RESTRICTED_COUNTRIES: reside or have tax residencies in the following restricted countries.

blockedNationality.blockedNationalityMessage: Due to compliance issues, MoneyOwl is unable to accept customers from the selected country.

editModalData.modalMessage: Due to compliance issues, MoneyOwl is unable to accept customers who are US Citizens, Permanent Residents or Tax Residents.

blockedCountry.blockedCountryMessage: We are unable to open your investment account as your country of residency is listed under the restricted country list. If information is incorrect, please update your MyInfo and try again. Alternatively, you can choose to open your investment account manually (non-myinfo).

FOREIGNER.title: Unable to apply Via MyInfo
FOREIGNER.message:
Sorry, we are unable to proceed your application via MyInfo as this feature is applicable to Singapore Citizens and Singapore Permanent Residents (PRs) only.

Please continue with the application by filling up the form manually.

Supporting documents are required. Takes at least 1 working day to get your account approved.

TAX_INFO.TITLE: Tax Information
TAX_INFO.TAX_MODEL_DESC:
For Singapore Tax Residents, please note that your NRIC/FIN No. is your Taxpayer Identification No.

Taxpayer Identification No. is a personal tax account number that has been assigned to you by the country that you are a tax resident of. For more information, please refer to http://www.oecd.org.
TAX_INFO.TIN_QUESTION: Do you have a Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) for the above country?
TAX_INFO.TAX_OTHER_COUNTRY: Are you paying tax in another country?
TAX_INFO.NRIC_HINT: For Singaporean taxpayers, TIN is usually NRIC.

UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.TITLE: Upload Documents
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PAGE_SUB_CAPTION: Help us verify your identity and prevent fraud.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.IDENTITY_VERIFICATION: For identity verifications, upload the required documents.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PROOF_OF_MAILING_SUBTEXT:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current mailing address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to today's date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PROOF_OF_RESIDENT_SUBTEXT:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current residential address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to today's date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.SUPPORTED_FILES: pdf, jpg, jpeg, png, gif, bmp

MAILING_ADDRESS_PROOF.TITLE: Proof Of Mailing Address
MAILING_ADDRESS_PROOF.MESSAGE:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current mailing address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to todayâ€™s date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.

RES_ADDRESS_PROOF.TITLE: Proof Of Residential Address
RES_ADDRESS_PROOF.MESSAGE:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current residential address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to todayâ€™s date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.

UPLOAD_LATER.TITLE: Upload Documents Later?
UPLOAD_LATER.MESSAGE:
You can upload your verification documents later to complete your investment account set up.

Would you like to continue?

UPLOADING_LOADER.TITLE: Uploading
UPLOADING_LOADER.MESSAGE: Please be patient, upload may take a few minutes.

FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED.TITLE: Error !
FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED.MESSAGE: File of size more than 10 MB is not allowed.

FILE_TYPE_MISMATCH.TITLE: Error !
FILE_TYPE_MISMATCH.MESSAGE: The selected file type is not allowed.

PERSONAL_DECLARATION.TITLE: Personal Declaration
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.PEP_DESC: Also known as a political figure, this person has been entrusted with a prominent role in governing bodies and/or state-owned enterprises.
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.BENEFICIAL_DESC: This person is the decision maker of the investment funds and has full control over the assets.
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.QUESTION1: Are you a director, officer, trading representative or employee of SGX trading?
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.QUESTION2: Are you a Politically Exposed Person (PEP), close associate of a PEP or family member of a PEP?
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.QUESTION3: Is someone else the actual beneficial owner of this account?

UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS_LATER.TITLE: Upload Documents Later
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS_LATER.UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS__LATER_PAGE_DESC: Please log in anytime to upload your verification documents and your set up will be complete!

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.TITLE: Additional Declaration
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS__LATER_PAGE_DESC: Please log in anytime to upload your verification documents and your set up will be complete!
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.PERSONAL_SAVINGS: Please indicate the employer that contributed most to your savings:
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.INHERITANCE_GIFT: Please indicate from whom you inherited the wealth and the reason for receiving the wealth:

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION.TITLE: Additional Declaration
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION.PEP_INFO: Please provide the following details for the PEP
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION.PEP_INFO_NO: Please complete this page only if you or any of your family member is a Politically Exposed Person ("PEP")

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION_SUBMIT.TITLE: Your form has been submitted
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION_SUBMIT.DESC: We will get back to you on your application in 1 - 2 working days.

OPEN_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Login via MyInfo
OPEN_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION:
Applicable to Singapore Citizens and Singapore Permanent Citizens (PRs) only. Otherwise, please return to fill form manually.

By signing in to MyInfo, the following information that you have previously entered will be overwritten.
Nationality
Personal Details
Residential Details

Would you like to proceed and overwrite?

MYINFO_CONFIRM.TITLE: Login via MyInfo
MYINFO_CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION:
Applicable to Singapore Citizens and Singapore Permanent Citizens (PRs) only. Otherwise, please return to fill form manually.

You will now proceed to login via MyInfo and retrieve your following details.
Nationality
Personal Details
Residential Details

Would you like to proceed?

ERROR_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Oops, Error!
ERROR_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: We werenâ€™t able to fetch your data from MyInfo.

FETCH_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Fetching Data...
FETCH_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Please be patient while we fetch your required data from MyInfo.

SING_PASS_CONFIRM.TITLE: Following details will be auto filled Via Myinfo:

PERSONAL_INFO_ERROR.TITLE: Oops, Error!
PERSONAL_INFO_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: We note that your personal details are different from what has been used for Comprehensive Planning. Should you proceed, please take note that your Comprehensive Planning report may be inaccurate. We encourage you to review your inputs again to ensure they are accurate.

ACCOUNT_CREATION_ERROR_MODAL.TITLE: Error !
ACCOUNT_CREATION_ERROR_MODAL.DESCRIPTION: Please fix the below list of errors and then proceed.

GENERAL_ERROR.TITLE: Error !
GENERAL_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: Sorry, Something went wrong. Please try again.

CREATING_ACCOUNT_LOADER.TITLE: Submitting your application
CREATING_ACCOUNT_LOADER.DESCRIPTION: Please wait while we try to create account.

CASH_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS.TITLE: Investment Account Setup Successful
CASH_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS.DESC: Your portfolio is ready to be funded!

SRS_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS.TITLE: Investment Account Setup Successful
SRS_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS.DESC: Your buy request(s) will complete in 1 - 2 working days.

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION_SUBMITTED.TITLE: Your form has been submitted
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION_SUBMITTED.DESC: We will get back to you on your application in 1 - 2 working days. Your portfolio will be shown on your dashboard once your application is approved.

ACCOUNT_CREATION_PENDING.TITLE: Almost There!
ACCOUNT_CREATION_PENDING.DESC: We will get back to you on your application in 1 - 2 working days.

DOCUMENTS_PENDING.TITLE: Almost There!
DOCUMENTS_PENDING.DESC: You may upload your verification documents later and your set up will be complete!
